overview:
Over 10 years of experience in the digital industry. Living in London UK and currently Project & Studio Director at Boxlight a successful Digital Agency based in Soho.

I’ve had the opportunity to work with some of the most exciting start-ups as well as world leading advertising agencies in which I’ve always strived to bringing something new and exciting to the table. From a concept sketch or doodle to a more concrete design bringing projects to life is what I do best. I enjoy breathing fresh air into an idea and then overlook all aspects of production and deliver it to millions to experience. I get the best results possible out of any team and ensure we not only deliver on time but over deliver.

I love creating, making, solving and learning.

If it’s digital I’ve most likely done it, had a go at doing it or know someone who can.

Specialties Digital strategic planning , UX, Design, Usability, IA, Digital Strategy, Agency consultant, Startup consultant, Social Media, Development, Social Networks, Interaction Design and User Acceptance Testing
